cs.IR, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with bid optimization in sponsored search, which is a subfield of information retrieval (IR) and online advertising. The problem involves optimizing bids on a subset of keywords, which can be modeled as a combinatorial optimization problem and falls under the category of algorithms and data structures (DS). The paper also presents a linear programming (LP)-based algorithm, which is a common technique in optimization and falls under the category of machine learning (LG) and artificial intelligence (AI). Finally, the paper discusses the complexity of the problem and presents hardness results, which is a common topic in theoretical computer science (GT).
